title: NDA - Partnership Arrangement for the Establishment and Operation of a Dairy Cattle Production and Rearing Farm Business for Dairy Development

description.description:
The NDA and the partner shall enter into a Partnership Agreement for the Establishment and Operation of a Dairy Cattle Production and Rearing Farm Business for Dairy Development with the following features:

1. Dairy cattle production, upgrading, and rearing shall be undertaken in the farm.  
 
2. The NDA shall provide dairy heifers/cows as its equity in the partnership including support systems for breeding such as dairy semen, breeding paraphernalia, liquid nitrogen, semen tank, and the like.

3. The partner shall provide the suitable farm for the equivalent number of cattle with grazing areas, feeds and forage, corresponding cattle sheds and milking parlor, and other farm infrastructure and utilities like electricity and water.  

4. The sharing of profits/losses shall be proportionate to the respective project equity.

5. Joint project management shall be exercised by both parties through equal representation in the Project Management Group. Daily farm management shall be the partner's responsibility.


The project aims to: 1) increase the number and quality of local dairy animals through the establishment and operation of dairy cattle production and rearing farm; and 2) improve dairy cattle production systems through the creation of local sources of dairy cattle in partnership with the private sector.

title: NTA - Establishment of Tobacco Leaf and Grading Institute

description.description:
The establishment of a Tobacco Research and Grading Institute is timely and appropriate in response to the ever growing clamors of tobacco farmers against adoption by the tobacco companies of uninformed international grading system which deviated from the NTA grading and classification standards and resulted in the down grading of their tobacco produce, hence lesser income derived therefrom. 

To establish a training institute for the company graders, TPROs/ Agriculturists, other NTA employees, student researchers, farmers/ farmer leaders. The project shall develop and deliver an optimum policy of training and education in the transfer of knowledge and skill of the trainees on the NTA harmonized system to become effective, efficient and globally competitive.

risk.risk: Budget deferred due to budgetary constraints hence, the availability of budget from RA 4155

title: NTA - Farmers Organizational Development (FOD)

description.description:
This project include the continuing registration of farmers, strengthening farm clusters, organizational development and livelihood assistance, to enable the farmers to become self-reliant, food secured and become active partners of development 

Conducting FOD Strategic Planning and Workshop which aims at reinventing the FOD group and and identification of the actual needs and problems of one recepient coop/association per Branch Office and construct a socio-economic activity plan

description.description:

title: BAI-Construction and Improvement of National Veterinary Quarantine Services- Central Office and Veterinary Quarantine Stations (VQS) Buidings Including Checkpoints

description.description:
The National Veterinary Quarantine Services Division (NVQSD) under the Bureau of Animal Industry was institutionalized in 2014 pursuant to EO No.366. As a newly created division, the construction of buildings to house the main office of the National Veterinary Quarantine Services Division and the regional stations are necessary to provide a suitable and safe workplace and working environment for the Division to facilitate the delivery of regulatory services and for its efficient operations. 

The Central office building design shall include the following features:  
•	Information desk
•	Online application services kiosk 
•	Offices (chief, regulatory section, policy section, administrative unit, VQS area for three (3) Regional Cluster of the Veterinary Quarantine Stations)
•	seating requirements of 20 to 50 applicants
•	Meeting room or Conference hall with capacity of atleast 250 persons
•	One service elevator
•	Animal examination room at the ground floor
•	Clients room with separate area for breastfeeding and playroom for children
•	Isolation and holding room for confiscated commodities
•	Fitness room
•	Shared accommodation area for 50 guests
•	Access and toilets for PWD and Senior Citizen
•	Hard and soft landscaping works
•	Employee pantries with kitchen equipment for safe and hygienic food preparation

Further, a total of Nineteen (19) out of the twenty-one VQS were identified for the design and construction of BAI-VQS regional offices.  The design and costing that will be adopted will be based on the comprehensive and cost-efficient proposal of the VQS Region II.

title: BAI-Establishment of the Mindanao Centre for Livestock Disease Control and Preparedness (MCLDCP)

description.description: The establishment of the Mindanao Centre for Livestock Disease Control and Preparedness is therefore envisaged to serve as the central office for animal disease control, surveillance and monitoring in Mindanao. With the threat of infectious and notifiable diseases in the country such as HPAI, ASF, Food and Mouth Disease, Classical Swine Fever, among others, the industry will be faced continuously on potential risk for food security. This project will enhance the surveillance and monitoring of diseases with the improvement of facility, delivery of services and its implementation of regulatory functions with adequate manpower and tools to sustain its role.

title: Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) Software and Hardware

description.description:
"The Animal Disease Diagnosis and Reference Laboratory (ADDRL) is preparing for an ISO 17025 accreditation. It is essential that the laboratory is equipped with a suitable LIMS.

The existing server for ADDRL’s LIMS uses an ordinary desktop computer thus the internet connectivity is very slow and the in-house developed program is outdated and has a limited security feature. In addition, the ADDRL system is not compatible with the BAI-PhilAHIS server. Because of these limitations, the objective of having a good data management system cannot be fully implemented. "
